name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Detail-oriented Audio Engineer with a strong focus on delivering high-quality audio products. Proficient in **audio mastering and mixing**, **equalization (EQ)**, **dynamic range control**, and **loudness normalization**. Experienced in working with piano-vocal and acoustic music, ensuring a natural and warm sound in all projects. Adept at **delivering streaming-ready and radio-ready masters** that meet industry standards. 
With 10+ years of software development experience, I have a solid background in leveraging **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to create tools that enhance audio processing capabilities. Skilled in utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js** for robust front-end solutions, and **FastAPI** and **Django** for back-end integration. My expertise also extends to deploying applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring high-performance and reliable audio solutions. 
Committing to excellence, I pay meticulous attention to detail in every audio project, coupling technical proficiency with a passion for creating impactful sound experiences.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Applied attention to detail in audio mastering and mixing, ensuring a natural and warm sound for various projects, resulting in high-quality deliverables ready for streaming and radio broadcast.
•	Utilized equalization (EQ) techniques and dynamic range control to enhance audio clarity and balance, improving the overall listening experience of recordings.
•	Maintained consistent loudness normalization across projects, adhering to industry standards and delivering streaming-ready masters that meet technical specifications.
•	Collaborated with artists and producers to tailor mixes for piano-vocal and acoustic music styles, preserving the integrity and emotion of each performance, leading to **9+** successful album releases.
•	Leveraged advanced audio editing tools and software, mastering audio tracks in formats compatible with various distribution platforms.
•	Conducted detailed reviews of audio mixes, implementing feedback for continual improvement, yielding **100%** client satisfaction on final master approvals.
•	Employed critical listening skills to identify and correct unbalanced tonalities and inconsistencies in tracks, ensuring a polished final product that resonates with intended audiences.
•	Delivered consistent masters that are optimized for different playback formats, demonstrating proficiency in audio techniques that enhance the listener's experience.

Focused on delivering high-quality audio outputs by mastering and mixing tracks, ensuring natural and warm sound quality for various music genres, including piano-vocal and acoustic.
Applied meticulous attention to detail in the equalization (EQ) process to enhance dynamic range control and achieve the optimal loudness normalization for streaming-ready and radio-ready masters.
Leveraged sophisticated audio production techniques to create a polished final product that meets industry standards while exceeding client expectations in sound clarity and fidelity.
Collaborated with artists and producers in a dynamic environment to understand creative visions, ultimately delivering tracks that resonate with audiences through compelling audio engineering practices.
Maintained up-to-date knowledge of the latest audio technologies and tools to continuously refine the mastering process, ensuring exceptional sound quality across all platforms.

Utilized **dynamic range control** and **equalization (EQ)** techniques to enhance audio quality for music projects, ensuring a **natural and warm sound** that meets industry standards.
Carefully crafted and delivered **streaming-ready masters** and **radio-ready masters** by applying **loudness normalization** processes to optimize playback quality across various platforms.
Employed meticulous **attention to detail** while mixing and mastering audio tracks, with a focus on **piano-vocal** and **acoustic music** genres, ensuring that each element is balanced and polished.
Analyzed audio tracks to achieve high fidelity and clarity, utilizing technical knowledge of sound engineering principles and best practices.
Collaborated with artists and producers to understand project requirements, facilitating improved communication and project alignment for successful outcomes.
Produced audio mixes that consistently meet specified client requirements, with a proven track record of delivering over **100** projects successfully within tight deadlines.
Conducted regular quality checks post-production to ensure all audio files are fit for release and adhere to the highest quality standards.
